## queryDeferred() function

Query all deferred tasks from OmniFocus. Returns tasks that have a defer date set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function queryDeferred(
  options?: DeferredQueryOptions
): Promise<CliOutput<OFTask[]>>;
```
